medium_description_en: Calculates pregnancy dates, forward from last period or backward from due date.
short_description_en: From LMP, gest age or due dates.
instructions_en: Enter last menstrual period (LMP), current gestational age (GA), OR expected due date to determine the other two, plus estimated date of conception.

seo.meta_description_en: The Pregnancy Due Dates Calculator Calculates pregnancy dates, forward from last period or backward from due date.
seo.keywords_en: pregnancy due date, preg calc, pregnancy due date calc, pregnancy weeks, lnmp calc, lnmp preg calc, lnmp pregnancy calc, lmp calculator, lmp pregnancy, lmp pregnancy calculator, pregnancy calculator, precnancy calc.

how_to_use.use_case_en: Patients who are pregnant or may be pregnant.

about.formula_en:
To calculate pregnancy due date from LMP:

  • Determine last date of LMP.
  • Add 40 weeks to the date.

Original/Primary Reference.text: Chervenak FA, Skupski DW, Romero R, et al: How accurate is fetal biometry in the assessment of fetal age?. Am J Obstet Gynecol 1998; 178:678.

creator_info.about_en:
Leading expert on the Pregnancy Due Dates calculator:

Frank A. Chervenak, MD, is a professor, chief OB-GYN and chairman of the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at the New York Presbyterian Hospital. He is the author of “How Accurate Is Fetal Biometry in the Assessment of Fetal Age”, a comparative study of the gestational age prediction equation for singletons, twins and triplets with other pregnancy prediction formulas. Dr. Chervenak has published 250+ papers and co-authored/edited textbooks on topics including ultrasound and ethics in obstetrics and gynecology and physician leadership.
